meanings.definition: A vitamin of the B complex, found in unrefined grains, beans, and liver, and necessary for carbohydrate metabolism.
meanings.sent1: Thiamine is important for our body to use carbohydrates.
meanings.sent2: I make sure to eat foods rich in thiamine like beans and grains.
meanings.sent3: Without thiamine, our bodies would struggle to process carbs efficiently.
meanings.sent4: Thiamine acts like a key that unlocks the energy from carbohydrates.
meanings.sent5: Remember to include thiamine-rich foods in your diet for energy production.
